item.description: /c/Guild Wars 2 on lemmy.wtf [home] [/c/guildwars2 ðŸŒŽ] [lemmy.wtf] Description Welcome to /c/guildwars2 on Lemmy. # Links **Official** - [guildwars2.com](https://guildwars2.com) - [Wiki](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/Main_Page) **Builds** - [Snow Crows](https://snowcrows.com/builds) - [Discretize](https://discretize.eu/builds/) - [Gw2Mists](https://gw2mists.com/builds) - [Metabattle](https://metabattle.com/wiki/MetaBattle_Wiki) - [Hardstuck](https://hardstuck.gg/gw2/builds/) - [GuildJen](https://guildjen.com/builds/) **Tools** - [Blish HUD](https://blishhud.com/) - [GW2-UOAOM](https://github.com/gw2-addon-loader/GW2-Addon-Manager) - [Discretize Gear Optimizer](https://optimizer.discretize.eu/) Details Activity Count Subscribers 145 Posts 14 Comments 108 Daily Active Users 14 Weekly Active Users 24 Monthly Active Users 24 Activity Date Published 2023-06-11 21:37:27 Updated 2023-06-15 17:55:04 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:19
